nodes.name: The Legend of Monkey Island
nodes.summary: Adventure towards the legendary Mêlée Island, on a quest to find and help Guybrush Threepwood in an effort to end the returning terror of Lechuck on the high sea's. From grog drinking to shipwreck searching, embark on a journey fit for any

nodes.name: Ferry of the Damned
nodes.summary: This mod adds an Alt start to the game, instead of waking up on a prison ship, you wake up on the ferry of the damned. The fringe between death and the mortal realm.

nodes.name: Dreugh Kingdom Hive
nodes.summary: This mod adds a new dreugh dungeon hive on the coast in between Khuul and Ald Velothi.

nodes.name: Imperial Prison Ship Revisited
nodes.summary: Imperial Prison Ship Revisited re-adds the starter ship from the intro as a ship wreck for you to explore and loot.

nodes.name: Welcome aboard
nodes.summary: This mod adds ladders to the sides of Vanilla ships making it more easy to get aboard again.

nodes.name: The Sloop William
nodes.summary: This mod add's the legendary but small pirate ship, The Sloop William crewed by Anne bonny and Mary read. as a player home.

nodes.name: Cursed Sails
nodes.summary: This mod adds both board-able, skeleton and ghost fleets to the waters, along with some random encounters for you to view/interact with, these all act as mini dungeons, just like Sea Forts of Morrowind

nodes.name: Sea Forts of Morrowind
nodes.summary: 4 Regions, 4 Themes, 4 Sea Forts! Above the wave's upon the horizon sits a Sea Fortress, these act as mini dungeons for plundering, which sit a good swim away. Don't forget to use those ladders!

nodes.name: Heart of Fire
nodes.summary: From land to sea exploration, Help Pendragon find Captain Flameheart! and stop the ritual. and his return once and for all!

nodes.name: It's Just Rum
nodes.summary: It's Just Rum!! adds over 150 bottles of Rum to the shores of Vvardenfell. set to quench the thirst of any Pirate and smuggler.

nodes.name: Waters of Morrowind
nodes.summary: This mod reworks the inner sea's, Sea floor. Making it deeper and more expansive, Better then the vanilla flat shallow inner sea we have now.. It's filled with buried and sunken treasures, Lost and sunken ships dungeons and all that good

nodes.name: Athena's Hideout - A Pirate's Cove
nodes.summary: Discover the hidden hideout of the pirate legends! From what remains in its tavern made from the bones of fellow ships that once sailed in its very cave and laid to rest, this mod adds a pirate shipwreck cave along with a player home, a

nodes.name: Last Wish
nodes.summary: Discover the old velothi temple of Dras Mora and take on the new telvanni threat that have newly taken up residence.

nodes.name: Native Lands
nodes.summary: Overhaul's And Lightly Expands All 18 Ashlander Camps.

nodes.name: World of Morrocraft
nodes.summary: This project aims to add the world of Azeroth to Tamriel, currently under a year of development first to be created is the continent of Northrend and soon to follow will be Eastern Kingdoms and Kalimdor, This project is a new landmass,

nodes.name: Infected Telvanni Spore Creatures
nodes.summary: Adds 5 different types of Telvanni/Flood like creatures for you to use or play with these aren't added to the game so you'll need to add them yourself.

nodes.name: Seyda Neen Expanded
nodes.summary: This little mod basically does what half of the Seyda Neen overhaul mods do, And that's adding and expanding one what is there in vanilla Morrowind, my overhaul is more of an improvement upon the vanilla Morrowind's version of Seyda Neen.

nodes.name: Addamasartus Overhaul
nodes.summary: This is an Overhaul of a dungeon/cave which the player will normally encounter first as its near seyda neen and is home to some smugglers. North of Seyda Neen Before you get to the silt strider.

nodes.name: Willow Flower Cottage
nodes.summary: Located alittle east outside the Vivec Telvanni Canton alone the road near its bridge you will find a small little cottage with its own farm along with a beautiful view of Vivec City and the open ocean as your surrounded with Willow

nodes.name: Fort Pinewood
nodes.summary: This mod adds a dungeon and a new fort which is north of dagon fel you can find it on its own landmass

nodes.name: The Shadow Lands
nodes.summary: This mod merges all my landmass and dungeon mods apart from afew mods that add values and that adds creatures, so its an all in all mod of everything.

nodes.name: The Dungeoneering Journey
nodes.summary: This is a merge off all of my mods with a total of 70+ dungeons, some of the past and some of the present.

nodes.name: More Crossbows
nodes.summary: This mod adds more crossbows this is more of a personal mod since i feel like Vvardenfel doesn't have alot of crossbows so i placed afew steel crossbows in imperial forts and afew dwemer crossbows in the dwemer ruins.

nodes.name: The Lost Snow Caves
nodes.summary: This mod adds a set of five new dungeons to the island of solstheim most west of skaal village and also south of the crashed dwemer ship.

nodes.name: Shadowfel
nodes.summary: This mod is a merge of all my landmass mods, which are a total of six medium, large and small islands some have quests some are dungeons, Player Homes etc.

nodes.name: Tel's Resource Pack
nodes.summary: This mod merges all my single model mods that I've uploaded ever and into one esp, and yes they arent in game so you will need to place them all.

nodes.name: The Orsinium Project
nodes.summary: The Orsinium Project aims to bring our concept and lore of the orcish city of orsinium to the world of morrowind with an area and a city which serves a good place for current trade.

nodes.name: Tel Yana - The Aura Construct
nodes.summary: Help the remaining survivors of the imperial guard tasked to arrest members of house telvanni from what was once a booming telvanni tower to now a lost and forgotten centre of trade, Until something strange began to happen to the tower and

nodes.name: Bonecave Dungeons
nodes.summary: Adds five new bonecave dungeons to the red mountain region with loot and bosses to kill, also merges the three already uploaded bonecaves.

nodes.name: VampChair
nodes.summary: This unreleased 2018 mod adds a new vampire styled chair to morrowind, not actually placed ingame so you will need to place it yourself via the CS.

nodes.name: Rebuilding RavenRock
nodes.summary: Rebuilding RavenRock, basically breaks the whole east trading company questline to building RavenRock, Since this mod adds all the buildings and interiors to RavenRock when in vanilla you can only build half of whats offered.

nodes.name: Mimuard Ruins
nodes.summary: This mod adds a new set of dwemer ruins to Vvardenfel for you to explore loot and kill alot of creatures ove hidden afew chests for you to find some are seeable and some are well hidden.

nodes.name: The Balmora Manor
nodes.summary: This mod adds a nicely sized manor in.... Balmora yep you never would of guest by the title, comes with storage and alot of room and a nicely sized bedroom, was made in a vanilla style.

nodes.name: Ruined Bamz-Amschend
nodes.summary: Ruined Bamz-Amschend adds rocks and turns the ruins into more of a ruin when i first played this location it seemed big... And empty which was kinda strange so hopefully adding the rocks will make it seem abit more believable.

nodes.name: Apart Of Home
nodes.summary: Apart Of Home, basically adds a set of mushrooms and plants which you would find on morrowind to the entry of the Palace, i wanted to add something since it seened pretty boring.

nodes.name: Seyda Neen Better Docks
nodes.summary: I know 500 mods adds a better dock to  seyda neen, this was apart of an original project of mine that i never uploaded untill now, this is more of my own personal take on the docks.

nodes.name: Haunted Shack
nodes.summary: Haunted Shack, adds a nice little shack for the player to claim by getting ride of the restless soul that haunts the place.Located on the water at Seyda Neen.

nodes.name: Wolflock Cabin
nodes.summary: Wolflock cabin is a player home that is added to the island of solstheim its filled with storage shelves and chests for you to store your items and such in with a comfy fire to look at as your in bed.

nodes.name: Walled Skaal
nodes.summary: I've always found it strange that the Skaal village was so open and i have had the idea for a year now to make a basic wall around Skaal apart from adding clear ways out, Plus it makes sense.

nodes.name: Sheogorath ALIVE
nodes.summary: This mod turns the sheogorath statue into a living creature for you to either fight or talk to and should also be able to hold weapons and such.

nodes.name: Sword of Aeons
nodes.summary: The sword of aeons is a sword which can be found in fable and is one of the most powerful weapons of all of ablion.. Now its in Vvardenfel for some reason.

nodes.name: Molag Bals Blood Altar
nodes.summary: This mod adds a resource of molag bals blood altar which was made in the imagine of the blood altar found in skyrim.

nodes.name: The Secret Trading Hub
nodes.summary: This mod adds a secret Hlaalu trading hub underground, beneath seyda neen, In the lore of seyda neen it states that the house hlaalu control seyda neen yet no hlaalu are in sight only imperial guards guarding the docks.

nodes.name: Shrine of Boethiah Expansion
nodes.summary: Explore the sunken and lost shrine of boethiah with the exterior getting a face lift and feeling like its been claimed by the sea along with an underwater daedric shrine interior to explore and rob the shrine of its riches.

nodes.name: Cluttered Deck's
nodes.summary: This mod clutters all the full ship desks making them seem more like ships and not empty vessels, ships arent just for your traveling needs you know!, Also created and improved the pathfinding also.

nodes.name: Dagoth Sanvil's Fortress
nodes.summary: Explore and fight another one of Dagoth Urs kin, located north of Dagoths Facility destroy the last dagoth and end Dagoth Sanvils terror and possible future surprise.

nodes.name: The Shadowed Tunnels
nodes.summary: Adds a Velothi dungeon to the Dagon Fel region filled with chests loot and skellys to kill, and other stuff.

nodes.name: Secured City Vivec
nodes.summary: This mod adds more guards to the city of vives, i did this more due to the fact that it seems alot more empty more on the guards side, i remember playing as a criminal and stealing stuff and freely running around vivec because of the low

nodes.name: The Silent Hideout
nodes.summary: This mod adds a cave dungeon to seyda neen north east, filled with loot and things to kill.

nodes.name: The Whispering Shadows
nodes.summary: Adds a velothi tower dungeon east of Mawia.

nodes.name: The Six Traders
nodes.summary: Adds all six traders from the Modathon into one mod they can all be found in Seyda Neen the trading port.

nodes.name: The Living Crypt
nodes.summary: This mod adds a velothi dungeon that can be found north of Pelagiad you will find many things to loot and kill.

nodes.name: Re-Imagined Incarnate
nodes.summary: Re-Imagined Incarnate Totally redoes the vanilla cavern of the incarnate, making it more of a cave and adding a waterfall mushrooms and more grass making it seem like its own sanctuary of azura, as well as afew other things like changing up

nodes.name: Malacaths Rise
nodes.summary: I was placing afew of my dungeon mods in the dagon fel area when i came across the simple Malacath shrine and it seemed very de-cluttered so i added afew things, not alot but as much as i could without editing the landscape.

nodes.name: Temple Canton - ESO Inspired
nodes.summary: This mod overhauls the Vivec, Temple Canton exterior with an inspiration of the ESO Morrowind version, adding afew planters of trees and mushrooms and added lights as well as filling up the once largely empty space that the Temple Canton is

nodes.name: Fort Moonmoth Overhaul
nodes.summary: Fort Moonmoth Overhaul, Overhauls exterior of the fort adding bits of clutter and crates for that well lived in feeling along side a archery range for the odd solider to practice afew shots at, as well as an archery smith, The Overhaul also

nodes.name: Ruined Ancestral Tombs Overhaul
nodes.summary: This mod overhauls all 90+ interiors of the Ancestral Tombs found on Vvardenfel, i have gone for a ruined feel that being lots of webs and rubble, along side more undead and creatures to face in the tombs, Does add lights to the exterior of

nodes.name: Velothi Towers Expanded Overhaul
nodes.summary: This overhaul, overhauls and expands on all 13 of the Velothi Towers both interiors and exteriors all with similar looks but all are different types of designs, It also Expands and Overhauls Aundae Clan.

nodes.name: Shadow of Colossus
nodes.summary: A hidden and unmarked island that sits near the coast-line is home to a lost and forgotten tomb the island itself is overgrown and shows its age, once a place visited by many is now left in ruin, Its unknown what the tomb harbors inside its

nodes.name: Gan Darom Ruins
nodes.summary: Adds a dungeon mod west of dagonfel along the beach you can find when you follow the path.

nodes.name: Well Replaced
nodes.summary: Replaces the covered wells with open wells that are filled with water the locations are, Wolverine Hall, Pelagiad, Ebonheart, Dagon Fel.

nodes.name: The Shrine Defenders
nodes.summary: Adds Silver saints The Shrine defenders, to most of the daedric shrines their stats have been changed abit from the common golden saint so they are a little bit more powerful but should be easy work for a high level player.

nodes.name: Tomb of The Dead
nodes.summary: Adds a dungeon mod South of Caldera Left of The Road

nodes.name: Ulapp - Morrowind Shorts
nodes.summary: Adds a kill able creature to Dagoth Ur facility. Named Ulapp, one of the The Dagonators loyal ash ghouls. Based on the famous Morrowind shorts.

nodes.name: Balmora Outpost
nodes.summary: This mod adds a player home outside of Balmora and its FREEEEE...... Yep no need to spend any coin or kill any monsters, its all yours.... or is it..

nodes.name: Nchyren's Fort
nodes.summary: Adds a Dwemer dungeon for you to explore and loot, West of Bthuand the door is on the left of the ruin, you cant miss it.

nodes.name: Lava Caves Pack
nodes.summary: This mod adds all three of the cave dungeon mods that i have been working on, since their in the red mountain area i feel like they should be a pack that adds them to one plugin.

nodes.name: Egg Mine - Clutter Monkey Overhaul
nodes.summary: This overhaul, Overhauls three Egg mines and maybe more in the future, Abaesen-PuluEgg Mine, Abebaal Egg Mine and Ahallaraddon Egg Mine adding clutter and more growth to the caves as well as abit of lighting.

nodes.name: Clan Aundae Vampire Dungeons
nodes.summary: This mod adds all of the vampire dungeon tombs into one esp, I enjoyed making the tombs as much as i hope you enjoyed playing them and or looking around at the design i did for the tombs.

nodes.name: Cavern of Lava
nodes.summary: Adds a cave dungeon with a remains of a lost and forgotten cavern and with the remains of the long dead workers. filled with loot as well as a few hidden chests for you to find.

nodes.name: Dead Man's Cave
nodes.summary: Adds a nice dungeon filled with things to fight and loot, a long side a boss fight, Good luck btw.

nodes.name: Vassir-Didanat Mine - Clutter Monkey Overhaul
nodes.summary: Adds a new interior for the entry of the cave which has been made along side rubble and alot more detailing to the main cave interior.

nodes.name: Caldera Mine - Clutter Monkey Overhaul
nodes.summary: Adds more clutter and detail to the Caldera Mine.

nodes.name: Vampire Clans - Clutter Monkey Overhaul
nodes.summary: This mod is an overhaul off all the three vampire clans, this overhauls the interiors of the main clan, with few improvements as well as the overhaul itself.

nodes.name: Hollow's Deep
nodes.summary: Explore a newly discovered Dwemer ruin, with all the riches left behind for you to take.

nodes.name: Castle Volkihar
nodes.summary: Clan Volkihar is a powerful vampire tribe said to be from eastern Skyrim. Legend paints the Volkihar as paranoid and cruel. What will the other vampire clans on morrowind do and think to the arrival of Clan Volkihar,. will their be conflict

nodes.name: Tel Vos Overhaul XTREME
nodes.summary: This overhaul replaces and overhauls, The exterior of Tel Vos and its interiors, this also includes its Dungeon which has been extended by 10-11 cells and an extra dungeon of 5 cells.

nodes.name: -Order of Sanctity-
nodes.summary: A group of Imperial Knights have been commissioned by the Elder Council to oversee the potential threat of invasion from Dagoth Ur's blighted abominations and any other unnatural creatures that may threaten the Empire. Stationed at the old

nodes.name: -Tel Felisa-
nodes.summary: In Tel Felisa you will discover and work to destroy a spy amongst the Telvanni Council. Where you will be sent to discover whole new landmass, city, and sprawling dungeon for you to explore!

nodes.name: Veteran Dungeon Pack
nodes.summary: All four of the veteran dungeons that i made in the may modathon 2019.. all in one esp...
